What are you looking for? Advanced Search Home > All Categories > Entertainment&Music > Other - Entertainment > Resolved Question ? Member since: July 14, 2011 Total points: 67 (Level 1) Add Contact Block
Resolved Question Show me another » Whats owling, planking, and coning? i need to know coning for sure 1 year ago Report Abuse by drfbiovn... Member since: February 25, 2010 Total points: 576 (Level 2) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Asker Owling and planking are very similar. In owling you sort of perch like an owl by something for comedic effect. Planking is laying completely flat, like a plank of wood hence the name planking, also for comedic effect. Coning is completely different. Coning is when you go to a fast food restaurant and order ice cream in the drive-through, but when the person hands it to you instead of picking it up by the cone you pick it up the ice cream. Hope i helped. 1 year ago Report Abuse Asker's Rating: Asker's Comment: Thanks this is a perfect answer :) Action Bar: 0 stars - mark this as Interesting! Email Comment ( 0 ) Save Add to My Yahoo!
